title: Vice debate: why Mrs. Harris, why?
selftext: While Trump keep telling, COVID is not as dangerous as scientists claim, Pence said on TV, that Trump saved 100thousands of lives by closing borders for Chinese back in spring. They  contradict each other therefore to the max! Why didn't you hang in there and nailed him down for good!! Opportunities like this you don't get at Walmart, you know. Pay attention please. I'm Swiss and don't want to see your country going down.
